title: Plat 2 / Dia Midlaner LF Ranked Team
body:
Hello!


My name is Kevin, i come from Austria and i am 21 years old.
I play league since S1 wirh a pause between S4 and S5.

At the moment i am looking for a Team to play ESL and Team Ranked on a good atmosphere.

My Pros are:

that i got a rly save and chilled playstyle that allows me to play my laningphase always save and go even with high dia - master players,
that i am 100% resistent of saltyness,
that im more likely a teamplayer then a solocarry.

My Cons are:

that my mechanics are not on high dia level,


Main Champs:

Thalia - Pretty new on her but actualy comfortable on her
Lissandra
Vlad
Varus - Situational
Veigar

IGN: ESE Gamehunter

Hopefully i get a chance to show my potential.
